from PMLS_JsStatement where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND delFlag = '0'

dzqStatus = #{dzqStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dzqapprovedDate = #{dzqapprovedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, dzqNo = #{dzqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cityNo = #{cityNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, formState = mapper.select:
SELECT t.* ,bd.dicValue AS approveStatusNm ,u.userName AS userCreateName
FROM PMLS_JsStatement t LEFT JOIN BAS_DictionaryValue bd ON t.approveStatus = bd.dicCode AND bd.delFlag = 'N' LEFT JOIN dbo.USR_User u ON t.userIdCreate = u.userId AND u.delFlag ='N'
INNER JOIN (SELECT jssId FROM dbo.PMLS_JsStatement_Dtl WHERE ISNULL(requestAmount,0) = 0 AND delFlag = 0 GROUP BY jssId) AS qkTbl ON t.id = qkTbl.jssId
WHERE t.delFlag = '0' AND t.jssType = '28002'
AND t.CityNo = #{cityNo}
AND t.approveStatus = #{approveStatus}
AND t.jssNo LIKE CONCAT('%', #{jssNo, jdbcType=NVARCHAR},'%')
AND EXISTS (SELECT d.id FROM PMLS_JsStatement_Dtl d WHERE d.jssId = t.id AND d.delFlag ='0' AND d.reportId LIKE CONCAT('%', #{reportId, jdbcType=NVARCHAR},'%') )
AND ( t.companyNo LIKE CONCAT('%', #{companyNo, jdbcType=NVARCHAR},'%') OR t.companyName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{companyNo, jdbcType=NVARCHAR},'%') )
AND ( t.projectNo LIKE CONCAT('%', #{projectNo, jdbcType=NVARCHAR},'%') OR t.projectName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{projectNo, jdbcType=NVARCHAR},'%') )
ORDER BY t.dateCreate desc

SELECT t2.dicValue approveStatusNm ,t3.userCode userCreateCode,t3.userName userCreateName ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(50),FLOOR(ISNULL(t1.kpRate,0) * 100)) + '%' kpRateStr ,t1.* FROM dbo.PMLS_JsStatement t1 LEFT JOIN dbo.BAS_DictionaryValue t2 ON t2.dicCode=t1.approveStatus and t2.delFlag='N' LEFT JOIN dbo.USR_User t3 ON t1.userIdCreate = t3.userId AND t3.delFlag = 'N' LEFT JOIN dbo.Company t4 ON t1.companyId=t4.id AND t4.IsDelete=0 WHERE t1.delFlag=0
and t1.id=#{id}

SELECT c.cashBillNo,r.* FROM dbo.PMLS_StatementCashBill_Relate r LEFT JOIN dbo.Cash_Bill_Company c ON r.compId = c.id and c.delFlag=0 AND c.submitOaStatus!=21201 where r.delFlag=0 and r.pscompId = #{pscompId,jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER BY r.dateCreate DESC
